alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 11:55AM MST until January 13 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Frank Church Wilderness, Sawtooth/Stanley Basin, Sun Valley Region, and Big Lost Highlands, including but not limited to Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
